ui-predicate

Namespaces

  • vue
    • UIPredicateCoreVue

ui-predicate-comparison-argument.js

  1. /**
  2.  * This is a component adapter that can load any sub-components
  3.  * as long as these UIcomponents were registered in UIPredicateCore ArgumentType registry
  4.  * @type {Vue.Component}
  5.  */
  6. export default {
  7.   render(createElement) {
  8.     return createElement(
  9.       this.getArgumentTypeComponentById(
  10.         this.predicate.operator.argumentType_id
  11.       ),
  12.       {
  13.         props: {
  14.           value: this.predicate.argument,
  15.           predicate: this.predicate,
  16.         },
  17.         on: { change: this._setArgumentValue },
  18.       }
  19.     );
  20.   },
  21.   inject: ['getArgumentTypeComponentById', 'setArgumentValue'],
  22.   methods: {
  23.     _setArgumentValue(value) {
  24.       this.setArgumentValue(this.predicate, value);
  25.     },
  26.   },
  27.   props: {
  28.     predicate: {
  29.       type: Object,
  30.       required: true,
  31.     },
  32.   },
  33. };
